verbs.description: [ARG0: italian culture] [V: has] [ARG1: relevance] [ARGM-LOC: at columbia] opinion a recent commentary published on silive by a disgruntled italian american indicts columbia university for its lack of acknowledgment of christopher columbus and more broadly the italian american community as a native staten islander currently pursuing her doctorate in italian studies at columbia i felt the need to respond to this very passionate – and tragically misinformed – opinion piece i ’d like to respond to several claims from the previous article firstly the author states that columbus is persona non grata at columbia murder columbia italian american community columbia south carolina paterno italian culture italian republic president haiti america rape staten islander italy columbia butler library italian academy christopher columbus dante christina a mcgrath columbias butler library sergio mattarella royal academy of italy dominican republic columbia university
